This is very simple. 

1. Download the Torrent, and Launch in torrent downloader program. ( Bit Torrent is what I use. )

2. After download finishes, open the folder named "Call of Duty 2" that you just downloaded. There will be a CoD2_SP .exe file, Call of duty 2.daa, and a keygen.exe.

3. Mount the .daa using a .iso program. ( I used UltraISO. Yes, the .daa WILL mount. ) 

4. Now, minimize UltraISO, open "My Computer" and find your ISO drive. ( Commonly the (J:) drive. It should be labeled "CoD2DVD". Double click "CoD2DVD" and find the setup.exe.

5. Be sure to run the "Keygen.exe" from the original torrent download folder and generate a unique key to enter at setup!

6. When the setup completes, return to the original "Call of Duty 2" folder downloaded from the torrent, and copy the CoD2_SP.exe sile into the C:/program files/Activision/Call of Duty 2/ folder, overwrite the original exe.

7. When wanting to play, use the new CoD2_SP.exe to play the single player game. Make sure to patch your multiplayer client to play the multiplayer!!!!
